sentences.en: a car with highly responsive steering
sentences.cn: 方向盘操纵灵活的汽车

sentences.en: Annuals, as a general rule , are very responsive to phosphorus fertilization.
sentences.cn: 通常说来,对一年生植物施用磷肥是相当有效的.

sentences.en: At hearing his name spoken, the dog gave a responsive wag of his tail.
sentences.cn: 听到有人喊它的名字，这条狗摆了摆尾巴。

sentences.en: Burke's sentiments undoubtedly struck a responsive chord in Parliament.
sentences.cn: 伯克的观点无疑引起了议会的积极回应。

sentences.en: Firms have to be responsive to consumer demand.
sentences.cn: 公司必须对顾客的需求作出积极反应。

sentences.en: I tried to get him talking about his problems, but he wasn’t very responsive .
sentences.cn: 我试图让他谈谈他的问题，但他不是很愿意讲。

sentences.en: My reply may be thought less responsive than this generous message deserved.
sentences.cn: 我的复电可能被认为与这封胸襟宽广的来电应该得到的回答并不相称.

sentences.en: She's fairly responsive to new ideas.
The company is highly responsive to changes in demand.
sentences.cn: 该公司对需求的变化反应特别迅速.

sentences.en: The lung possesses its own local immune responsive system.
sentences.cn: 肺本身就具有局部免疫反应系统.

sentences.en: The reflections are recorded by detecting instruments responsive to ground motion.
sentences.cn: 反射波由对地面振动极敏感的探测仪器记录下来.

sentences.en: They were, however , alive , responsive, and sexually endowed girls.
sentences.cn: 他们都是些活泼 、 同声相应和天赋性感的女孩子.

sentences.en: This car's steering isn't very responsive.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车的方向盘不太灵活.

sentences.en: This is a responsive class with plenty of ideas.
sentences.cn: 这个班上课反应积极，想法层出不穷。

sentences.en: This poem has struck a responsive chord in the hearts of its readers.
sentences.cn: 这首诗引起了读者的共鸣.

sentences.en: Three months before birth babies are already responsive to sound.
sentences.cn: 在出生前3个月，胎儿就已经对声音有反应了。

sentences.en: With an election coming soon, your MP should be very responsive to your request.
sentences.cn: 选举在即，你的下院议员应当对你的要求作出积极的回应。

sentences.en: With an election coming soon, your representative should be very responsive to your request.
sentences.cn: 大选在即，你们的代表应该对你们的要求作出迅速积极的反应。

words.tran_cn: 回答；作出反应；承担责任

trans.tran_cn: 应答的，响应的，反应灵敏的，共鸣的，易反应的
trans.tran_en: reacting quickly, in a positive way
